DOC.brief_summary: The aim study examine whether periodic fast improve marker diabetes risk cardiovascular health , compare effect observe daily diet energy restriction , also change energy intake . It hypothesize periodic fasting , without weight loss , effective daily energy restriction improve marker metabolic health energy metabolism .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Periodic Fasting Versus Daily Energy Restriction Metabolic Health
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 25 42 kg/m2 weight stable ( < 5 % fluctuation body weight 6 month prior study entry ) history cardiovascular disease , diabetes , major psychiatric disorder , eat disorder use prescribed nonprescribed medication may affect energy metabolism , gastrointestinal function , body weight , appetite recent weight change 3 month prior study entry uncontrolled asthma , current fever , upper respiratory infection individual regularly perform high intensity exercise ( > 2 session per week ) pregnancy , lactation ( breast feeding ) , woman plan become pregnant current intake > 140g alcohol per week current smoker cigarettes/cigars/marijuana current intake illicit substance experience claustrophobia confine space donate blood within past 3 month unable comprehend study protocol experience migraine
